snippet: Bob Fisher wants to sell his 50-acre estate on a mountain top in North Carolina by the end of the month, and he insists he will do it without a broker.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column discusses plight of Bob Fisher who is trying to sell his his 50-acre estate; Fisher bought the mountaintop North Carolina property in 1999, and insists he will sell it by the end of the month and do it without a broker; he is convinced he can do a better job of marketing the property, with an asking price of $18 million to $25 million, than the professionals can.
lead_paragraph: Bob Fisher wants to sell his 50-acre estate on a mountain top in North Carolina by the end of the month, and he insists he will do it without a broker.

headline.print_headline: For Sale by Owner, a Multimillion-Dollar Mountain Estate
headline.seo: Selling Sagee Manor Estate in Highlands, N.C. - Wealth Matters
headline.main: For Sale by Owner, a Multimillion-Dollar Mountain Estate
